mapper.sql: SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, itemno, itemname, unit, unitprice, sortno, organization, useflag
mapper.insert: insert into KQDS_GIVEITEM (SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, itemno, itemname, unit, unitprice, sortno, organization, useflag) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useflag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update KQDS_GIVEITEM
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemno = #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemname = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unitprice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sortno = #{sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
useflag = #{useflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_GIVEITEM set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemno = #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemname = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitprice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortno = #{sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, useflag = #{useflag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select tc.seq_id, tc.useflag, tc.createtime, p.user_name as createuser, tc.itemname, tc.unit, tc.unitprice, tc.sortno, tc.itemno jlname from KQDS_GIVEITEM tc LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON p on tc.createuser = p.seq_id where 1=1
and tc.itemno like '%' + #{itemno} + '%'
and tc.itemname like '%' +#{itemname}+ '%'
and tc.organization = #{organization} ORDER BY tc.sortno asc

select seq_id,itemno,itemname from KQDS_GIVEITEM where 1=1
and organization = #{_parameter}
select seq_id,itemname from KQDS_GIVEITEM where 1=1 and useflag = 0 and (organization = #{_parameter} or organization = '') ORDER BY sortno asc
select count(1) from KQDS_GIVEITEM where itemno in (${_parameter})
select seq_id,itemname from KQDS_GIVEITEM where seq_id in (${_parameter})
